definitions.definition: (especially of food or drink) having a taste similar to that of sugar; not bitter or salty:
examples: The pineapple was sweet and juicy.

definitions.definition: a small piece of sweet food, made of sugar:
examples: She bought a packet of sweets to suck on the way.

definitions.definition: any food with a lot of sugar in it:
examples: No cake, thanks. I'm trying to avoid sweets.

definitions.definition: sweet food eaten at the end of a meal:
examples: There was only one sweet on the menu - chocolate cake with cream.
